synopsis.text: Stars of the stage captivated the world in the 20th century, turning the theater into a global phenomenon. The most talented performers, known as "Dai Stars," shone the brightest, with the creme de la creme earning the prestigious title of "World Dai Star." One such aspiring actress, Kokona Ootori, dreams of joining the ranks of these elite performers. Despite facing multiple rejections and growing self-doubt, Kokona remains determined to make her mark on the world of theater. With the unwavering support of her best friend, Shizuka, and a newfound opportunity to audition for the renowned Sirius theater troupe, Kokona embarks on a journey to hone her acting skills and claim her place in the spotlight. But the path to stardom is fraught with competition, as other talented hopefuls, like the gifted Kathrina Griebel, vie for the same coveted role. Can Kokona rise above the rest and achieve her dream of becoming a World Dai Star? Only time will tell as she takes her first steps on the stage and begins to cultivate her unique sense for the theater.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
